attributes.action: Manage this web site properly and prevent so many duplicate petitions
attributes.additional_details:
How can a single petition ever achieve the 100,000 when there are dozens of petitions all saying the same thing and dividing the number of signatories between them?

There are currently well over 20 petitions all asking for the restoration of Capital Punishment.

And many other duplications on other issues

Try and manage the site in a professional manner, not like a bunch of amateurs
